Text: FW Link to EPA Transaction ReportOriginal Message From Wells Wade Sent Thursday July PM To Woods Trevor Cc Tai Wei Subject Link to EPA Transaction Report Hey Trevor I have checked into running the Transaction Report from the EPA website and this is what I have come up with The instructions to run a Transactions Report are located at airmarketstrackingindexhtml The site to run the report is located at airmarketstrackingatstransactionshtml I ran a sample report with some bogus search criteria I then copied the results to a spreadsheet and sorted based on Amount Below is a copy of this report for you to review I think this might be a good solution to your need for a transaction report Due to the fact that our group is low on resources it might be best to see if we can make this work before we spend a lot of time adding this to the SO Report program Of course if the EPA Transaction Report does not meet your needs we will do whatever we can to accommodate you Wade
SO Documentation Cc Hey Mike Attached is the documentation we discussed yesterday Let me know if you have any questionssuggestions or anything Wade

SO Report Cc Other than the auto download portion the SO Report program is just about wrapped up I have completed correcting the numbers for the Ending Position and the Total Market Balance Chart All numbers now correctly add up It would probably work out best if you guys could downloadunzip the EPA files yourself until the auto download portion is completed If needed I can show you guys what it would entail Attached is the latest copy As usual just copy this file to CProgram FilesSOReport Thanks Wade

FWOriginal Message From Wei Tai Sent Monday April PM To Wade Wells Subject FW Wei H Tai Enron Net Works Global Markets Weather Trading Decision Support wei nroncom Original Message From Siegel Adam Sent Wednesday March PM To Tai Wei Subject Here is the link to the summary emissions numbers to match up with the allowance holdings If you have any questions dont hesitate to call Adam Siegel x airmarketsemissionsprelimarpindexhtml
Revised SO ProgramAttached is the latest rev Thanks Wade
Ownership reportsHey Mike The best I can figure is that Adam must have used a report from the link below and modified it Let me know what you think Wade airmarketstrackingindexhtml

RE so reportno prob give me about min to run it Original Message From Taylor Michael E Sent Wednesday September AM To Wells Wade Subject so report Wade Please run the report on your end I got a few errors while running it Not sure what is going on It did open and shows DPL pretty short which is in line with we think up here Michael Taylor Coal and Emissions Trading Enron Global Markets

RE Revised SO Program Cc Hey Mike It will be handled however the EPA handles the allowance emissions and the ownership data If the EPA shows each company as two separate entities then the SO program will do the same If we write code to handle this on our own luck would have it that the EPA will start reporting the two companies together It would probably be best for you to give them a call and inquire about how they normally handle this situation Wade Original Message From Taylor Michael E Sent Friday August AM To Wells Wade Subject RE Revised SO Program Wade On the SO Model if there is an merger or acquisition does the companies SO positions roll together For example I am being told that Carolina Power Light Co was acquired by Progress Energy They should only show one position under Progress Energy Please advise Mike Original Message From Wells Wade Sent Tuesday August AM To Woods Trevor Taylor Michael E Subject Revised SO Program Attached is the latest rev File SO Reportexe Thanks Wade
SO revisionPlease copy the attached exe to CProgram FilesSOReport This will fix the problem with the headers and footers Thanks Wade
Revised SO Report Cc Michael Copy this file to CProgram FilesSO Report Wade

Revised SO Report program Cc Hey Mike Due to a change of the SQL Server database the SO Report program had to be modified Attached is the revised copy of the program You will need to copy the attachment to your CProgram FilesSOReport directory While testing the revised code I ran the latest report dated which can now be found on the network Also attached is a copy of the program documentation Remember that data files must be kept in OLiquidsLiquidsCoalSOReportFiles Wade

RE S ModelHey Mike To install the SO Report program just go to OLiquidsLiquidsCoalSOReportInstall and run setupexe There is not much to it just be aware that it takes about min to generate the report and you should not cancel it once it has been started Wade Original Message From Taylor Michael E Sent Wednesday August PM To Wells Wade Subject S Model Wade I am a new analyst working under John Massey and Trevor Woods Trevor told me to contact you to get the SO Model installed on my computer so I can view it Thanks Mike Michael Taylor Coal and Emissions Trading Enron Global Markets

FW Latest rev of SO ReportTrevorMike This latest version corrects errors on the ending positions Another version will be coming out soon to correct the Total Market Chart Wade Original Message From Wells Wade Sent Friday July PM To Woods Trevor Cc Tai Wei Subject Latest rev of SO Report Hey Trevor Once again here is the latest SO Report revision This rev adds the Summary Sheet which contains the list of Top Ten Shorts and Top Ten Longs We will get to Top Ten Transactions next week It also generates the chart showing the Projected Total Market Ending Positions Let me know if you have any comments andor suggestions As always just copy the attachment to CProgram FilesSOReport Wade
